name: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA)
hydrogen peroxide (HP)
acetic acid (AA)
1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP)
and/or dipicolinic acid (DPA)
and optionally sulfuric acid (SA)
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA) (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (HP) (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), acetic acid (AA) (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7), 1-hydroxyethylidine-1,1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP) (CAS Reg. No. 2809-21-4), and/or dipicolinic acid (DPA) (CAS Reg. No. 499-83-2), and optionally sulfuric acid (SA) (CAS Reg. No. 7664-93-9). REPLACES FCN 2059
